name: Galaxy Sparkler
thumbnail3D: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 200'%3E%3Crect fill='%230a0a0a' width='200' height='200'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='100' cy='100' r='40' fill='%23ff6b00'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='100' cy='100' r='30' fill='%23ffd54f'/%3E%3Ctext x='100' y='110' font-size='30' text-anchor='middle' fill='%23000' font-weight='bold'%3ESparkler%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E
descriptionShort: Colorful sparkler with soft golden light, perfect for kids and family celebrations.
descriptionLong: Galaxy Sparkler offers mesmerizing golden sparks that fascinate children and adults alike. Safe, low-noise, and perfect for beginners.

name: Sky Rocket Premium
thumbnail3D: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 200'%3E%3Crect fill='%230a0a0a' width='200' height='200'/%3E%3Cpolygon points='100,50 150,150 100,130 50,150' fill='%23ff9800'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='100' cy='100' r='15' fill='%23ffeb3b'/%3E%3Ctext x='100' y='170' font-size='20' text-anchor='middle' fill='%23ff6b00' font-weight='bold'%3ERocket%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E
descriptionShort: Premium aerial rocket with brilliant burst pattern and long-lasting effect.
descriptionLong: Sky Rocket Premium delivers professional-grade aerial display with vibrant colors and crisp bursts. Perfect for celebrations and events.

name: Rainbow Fountain Deluxe
thumbnail3D: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 200'%3E%3Crect fill='%230a0a0a' width='200' height='200'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='100' cy='120' r='25' fill='%23ff6b00'/%3E%3Cpath d='M 80 100 Q 100 50 120 100' stroke='%23ffd54f' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/%3E%3Ctext x='100' y='165' font-size='18' text-anchor='middle' fill='%23ff9800' font-weight='bold'%3EFountain%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E
descriptionShort: Spinning fountain with multi-colored sparks and mesmerizing patterns.
descriptionLong: Rainbow Fountain Deluxe features continuous spinning action with cascading colored sparks. Ideal for adding festive charm to any celebration.

name: Fancy Flower Pot
thumbnail3D: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 200'%3E%3Crect fill='%230a0a0a' width='200' height='200'/%3E%3Cpath d='M 70 120 L 80 180 L 120 180 L 130 120 Z' fill='%23a0522d'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='100' cy='80' r='30' fill='%23ff6b00'/%3E%3Ctext x='100' y='185' font-size='16' text-anchor='middle' fill='%23ffd54f' font-weight='bold'%3EPot%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E
descriptionShort: Vibrant flower pot with cascading colored effects.
descriptionLong: Fancy Flower Pot creates beautiful flower-like bursts of colored sparks. Safe and perfect for children's celebrations.

name: Gold Chakkar Spinner
thumbnail3D: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 200'%3E%3Crect fill='%230a0a0a' width='200' height='200'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='100' cy='100' r='50' fill='%23ffd54f' opacity='0.3'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='100' cy='100' r='35' fill='%23ff6b00'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='100' cy='100' r='20' fill='%23ffd54f'/%3E%3Ctext x='100' y='155' font-size='18' text-anchor='middle' fill='%23ffeb3b' font-weight='bold'%3EChakkar%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E
descriptionShort: Spinning gold chakkar with bright sparks and continuous rotation.
descriptionLong: Gold Chakkar Spinner provides mesmerizing spinning effects with brilliant golden sparks. Great for decorative displays.

name: Mystic Wonder Pack
thumbnail3D: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 200'%3E%3Crect fill='%230a0a0a' width='200' height='200'/%3E%3Cpolygon points='100,50 150,100 125,150 75,150 50,100' fill='%23c62828'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='100' cy='100' r='20' fill='%23ffeb3b'/%3E%3Ctext x='100' y='170' font-size='16' text-anchor='middle' fill='%23ff6b00' font-weight='bold'%3EMystic%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E
descriptionShort: Special themed collection with unique effects and patterns.
descriptionLong: Mystic Wonder Pack offers a unique combination of effects with mesmerizing patterns. Perfect for special occasions and celebrations.
